members.joinCircumstances: Left the crew due to disagreement over abandoning the Going Merry

keyMoments.title: Decision to Abandon Going Merry
keyMoments.description: The crew makes the painful decision to abandon their beloved ship, the Going Merry, after learning it cannot be repaired.
keyMoments.significance: This decision tests the crew's unity and leads to their first major internal conflict.

keyMoments.title: First Crew Member Departure
keyMoments.description: Usopp becomes the first member to voluntarily leave the Straw Hat Pirates, unable to accept Luffy's decision about the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the darkest moment in the crew's history up to this point, showing that even the strongest bonds can be tested.

keyMoments.title: Internal Duel Scheduled
keyMoments.description: For the first time, two crew members - Luffy and Usopp - are set to duel each other, with the Going Merry as the prize.
keyMoments.significance: An unprecedented event that challenges the crew's concept of unity and loyalty.

ships.description: The crew's first ship, now damaged beyond repair and set to be replaced.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
